text: <@U017M677P18> the topic sounds interesting but in my experience (my 2 amateur podcasts), i'd do two things for the intro: 1) add some music and improve the sound quality of the intro (probably add some absorbing material to get rid of echo) and 2) add some story /drama as part of the grabber. Maybe start with a fact or personal story before getting so clinical.
